column1: What's the solution of the following system of equations $$\begin{array}{ccc} ax + by + cz= d \\ a^{2}\cdot x + b^{2}\cdot y + c^{2}\cdot z= d^{2} \\ a^{3}\cdot x + b^{3}\cdot y + c^{3}\cdot z= d^{3} \end{array}$$ if a, b, c are distint and non-zero
column2: the answer is $x= \frac{d(d - b)(c - d)}{a(a - b)(c - a)}, y= \frac{d(a - d)(d - c)}{b(a - b)(b - c)}, and z= \frac{d(b - d)(d - a)}{c(b - c)(c - a)}$

column6: $x= \frac{a(a + b)(c - a)}{d(d - b)(c - d)}, y= \frac{b(a + b)(b - c)}{d(a - d)(d - c)}, and z= \frac{d(b + d)(d - a)}{c(b - c)(c - a)}{d(b - d)(d - a)}$
column8: $x= \frac{d(d - b)(c - d)}{a(a - b)(c - a)}, y= \frac{d(a - d)(d - c)}{b(a - b)(b - c)}, and z= \frac{d(b - d)(d - a)}{c(b - c)(c - a)}$

Solve $$\begin{array}{ccc} (b + c)(y + z) - ax= b - c \\ (c + a)(z + x) - ax= c - a \\ (a + b)(x + y) - cz= a - b \end{array}$$ where $a + b + c\neq 0$
column2: the answer is $x= \frac{c - b}{a + b + c}, y= \frac{a - c}{a + b + c}, z= \frac{b - a}{a + b + c}$
column4: $x= \frac{c - b}{a + b + c}, y= \frac{a - c}{a + b + c}, z= \frac{b - a}{a + b + c}$
column5: $x= \frac{b - c}{a + b + c}, y= \frac{c - a}{a + b + c}, z= \frac{a - b}{a + b + c}$
column6: $x= \frac{c - b}{a - b - c}, y= \frac{a - c}{a - b - c}, z= \frac{b - a}{a - b - c}$
column8: $x= \frac{c - b}{a + b + c}, y= \frac{a - c}{a + b + c}, z= \frac{b - a}{a + b + c}$
